subdisciplines.name: Character Development
subdisciplines.description: The study and development of characters in fiction writing.

subdisciplines.name: Plot Development
subdisciplines.description: The study and development of the plot of a work of fiction.

subdisciplines.name: Dialogue
subdisciplines.description: The study and development of the dialogue in a work of fiction.

subdisciplines.name: Worldbuilding
subdisciplines.description: The study and development of the world in which a work of fiction is set.

subdisciplines.name: Genre-specific Writing
subdisciplines.description: The study and development of writing fiction that belongs to a certain genre.
